24.4. [Pseudo-Haimo] Homiliary of Pierre Quentell.
Homily | General
Manuscripts:
1. Avignon, Bibliothèque municipale 78. saec. xii; Gentilly, Célestins.
2. Chartres, Bibliothèque municipale 14 (25). saec. xi.
3. Florence, Biblioteca Medicea Laurenziana XXI, 10. saec. xii.
4. Florence, Bibliioteca Medicea Laurenziana Santa Croce, XXIII, dextr. 13. saec. xiii.
5. Lyons, Bibliothè municipale 628. saec. ix.
6. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France lat. 14523, f. 134-233v. saec. xiv-xv.
7. Paris, Bibliothèque nationale de France, n.a.l. 464. saec. xii.
8. Prague, Bibl. Capit. 782. saec. xii.
9. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica lat. 1282. saec. xii.
10. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Ottob. lat. 355.
11. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Reg. lat. 115. saec. xii; France.
12. Vatican, Biblioteca Apostolica Urb. lat. 105. saec. xv.
13. Zurich, Rheinau 12, p. 1-245. saec. x.
Bibliography:
1. Barré, Henri. Les Homéliaires carolingiens de l'école d'Auxerre. (Studi e testi, 225). Città del Vaticano: Biblioteca Apostolica Vaticana, 1962, p. 94-112; 180-194.
